quote: A human being in this aged nation of ours is a very wonderful whole, the slow creation of long interchanging influences; and charm is a result of two such wholes, the one loving and the one loved.
quote_letters: A HUMAN BEING IN THIS AGED NATION OF OURS IS A VERY WONDERFUL WHOLE THE SLOW CREATION OF LONG INTERCHANGING INFLUENCES AND CHARM IS A RESULT OF TWO SUCH WHOLES THE ONE LOVING AND THE ONE LOVED
